title: Problem with my home page and shop.
body: Please fix this, i have blank screen when i enter home page and shop in lol. I have good internet and i enter Repair on home page. The scan i over and still same problem. {{champion:32}}

replies.body: A blank or black screen in the client is usually due to a network issue that's failing to maintain a connection and download assets.  You can resolve this by going through each step of our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  Let me know if you have any questions!  {{champion:74}}
